column5: If there was any doubt that canada would win the gold.Carey Price is going to have to buy a seat just for his tropheys.
Never gets old watching them win the gold.  Congrats to the team, another great year.
I wish I could have caught the game, dang work.  Does anyone know if it will re-play later at all?  Tony
tony - tonight at 7:30 on TSN is the replay.  won't tell you who won lol.
you can also watch it @ tsn.ca   Gerritt.
I bet they won't show the entire post game interview with Jonathon Toews. Poor guy knew it the moment he said it.  -Brian
I watched the game on tsn.ca. Kinda cool to be watchin it at work.  What was it that Toews said in the post game interview???
Think it rhymed with Puck lol
